scenario_text.value: *huff*...*huff*... We... We beat her...
I... This can’t be happening...

It wasn’t supposed to go this way! Argh, at
any rate, I must regroup for now...
I’ll remember this, you little brats!
Yo, Shuuji!
Shuuji!

Wha’, what...? Ah, sorry... Ha ha, all the
strength has left my body...

The tension’s gone.
Don’t worry, just rest for now.
Shuujiii!

Oh, Lopmon... Thank you. You really held your
own out there.
Yeah...yeah! You too, Shuuji! Good job!

Haha... I can’t tell you how happy I am to
have you say that...

Aw jeez, what’s with the waterworks?
Laaame.
Ah...Ryo...

How’re you gonna be the leader if you ain’t
giving us your usual third degree, huh?
Heh... You certainly have a mouth on you.

But I’ll set you straight...as the leader,
I mean.
Heh heh, now look who grew a backbone!

Wait, what? How can they argue with those
grins across their faces?
It’s low-key creepy...

Well hey, just...think of it as a male
bonding moment, okay?
Yep. That’s definitely it.
Huh? I don’t get you guys. So weird...
Hey! Miu!
Ahahaha!

(This is great. Shuuji and Lopmon are safe,
and even Ryo’s getting along with them now.)

(No matter what the enemy throws at us, we
can overcome it together the way we are now.)
(I believe this from the bottom of my heart.)
Oh, hey, you guys! It’s the fog!
What? No way!
Damn, and we’re all ready to drop over here!
(Shoot! We have to tell everyone what to do!)
Gather up, everyone!
Hurry up and run away!
Stay calm, guys!
Gather up, everyone! As close as you can!
But then it’ll just surround us, man!
Oh no! The fog’s getting thicker and thicker!

Hurry up and run away, everyone! Don’t let
the fog surround you!
But Shuuji can’t move yet!
And we’re already surrounded, anyway!

Don’t panic, everyone! Let’s stay calm and
assess the situation!
Assess what?! It’s fog. FAST. FOG.
The stuff’s already surrounded us, anyway!

Yo, this is bad! The fog’s getting thicker
and thicker!
Hyah! Stay away!
Miu! ...Ugh, dammit!
What... What should we do?
(Is...this the end?)
All of you! Over here!
Wha’—Professor?!
You’re alive!
P-Professor... Thank goodness...

Looks like I gave you all quite the fright.
But come, you must hurry!

We must flee from here with all haste! I have
much to tell you, but that comes after.
Let’s go, guys!
This way, Takuma!

(I grabbed Agumon’s hand, and we left the
waterway behind us.)

(We were able to save Shuuji, but our
original goal remains unfulfilled...)

(Contacting someone who knows the truth of
this world, and how to return to ours.)

(Who knows if we can do that once we push
past this darkness?)

(Spurred on by the courage I received from
Agumon’s hand, I ran toward the light.)
...We did it.
Yeah...it’s over. Do you think we saved them?
I’m sure we saved them...

(But did we really...? In the end, all we did
was attack Lopmon...)

Well... They could still be okay. First, we
should check on Lopmon and—
Look! That fog is back!
Whoa, now it’s getting thicker and thicker!

Um, hey... Don’t you think this fog is
strange..?
Strange...?

(The fog’s surrounding us, but it’s not
getting any closer.)
(Wait, that’s not it...)
It’s...swallowing Lopmon!
Yeep! I’m scared...

What’s going on? It can pick and choose what
it goes after? It’s like it’s alive...
Ah, hey, wait! Give Shuuji back, dammit!

Hold on, idiot, you can’t do anything now!
You’ll just get caught up in it! Get away!
No way... This can’t be true!
Ahhh ha ha ha ha! Truly a sight to behold!

Watching a heart break into pieces is
absolutely amazing.
You! You did this, didn’t you?!
Why yes indeedy. A wonderful show, wasn’t it?

Give Shuuji and Lopmon back, you eight-legged
sack of shit!!!

I’m afraid that’s quite impossible. Still,
you have to feel a little bad for Lopmon, no?

Things wouldn’t have ended for him this way
if he’d never gotten involved with humans.

This is all your doing! The time for talk is
over! We’ll crush you!

I could play with you, if you’d like... But
no, perhaps I’ll call it a day instead.
Don’t you dare run! ...Dammit, she’s gone.
...Is this real?
Aoi...
Shuuji, Lopmon...

I don’t believe this... Hey, what the heck is
going on, here?!
Calm down. Just calm down, okay?!

How can I calm down?! What is this?! Where’s
Lopmon?! Where’s SHUUJI?!

You saw it, didn’t you? You saw what happened
to them!
This can’t be... This can’t be happening...

Is this the type of thing you were talking
about before?
No way I thought things would go this far...
...Dammit!

The signs were there that this could happen.
And yet...we couldn’t do anything!

You said there would be no more sacrifices,
but you were the next one, Shuuji!
Oh, Shuuji...

Hold it together, Aoi! You can’t fall apart
here, it’s too dangerous!
Thanks...

Shuuji couldn’t trust Lopmon, could he?
That’s just so sad...

Still, he said he’d become the sacrifice,
didn’t he?

In the end, Shuuji was desperately trying to
protect us...

(Yeah. We never saw eye-to-eye, but Shuuji
was doing his best, in his own way.)

(Always looking for the least dangerous
methods in order to keep us all safe.)

(He always took the lead in our searches and
tried to guide us.)

(Even his frustrating way of talking to us
was just to keep us strong.)

(Even though things turned out this way...
We should always remember that.)
(We should never forget...)
...that Shuuji worried about us.
...that Shuuji guided us.
...the reason Shuuji kept nagging us.
Shuuji always worried about our safety.
We should never forget that.
Shuuji always lead the way, guiding us.
We should never forget that.

Shuuji’s tendency to nag was his way of
trying to keep us all strong.
We can’t lose heart in times like this.

We may have pushed Shuuji into a corner
without even realizing it...

Relying on him just because he’s older...
Forcing such a difficult role on him...

This wouldn’t have happened if we’d worked as
a group... If we’d stuck together.

You’re beating yourself up too much, Aoi.
You’ll exhaust yourself again.
...Yeah, you’re right.
Ack, hey you guys! The fog’s coming this way!
What? No way!
We’re its next targets?!
Gather up, everyone! As close as you can!
(Damn, now of all times?)
(We don’t even have time to mourn?!)

Yo, this is bad! The fog’s getting thicker
and thicker!
Hyah! Stay away!
Miu! ...Ugh, dammit!
What... What should we do?
(Is...this the end?)
All of you! Over here!
Wha’—Professor?!
You’re alive!
P-Professor... Thank goodness...

Looks like I gave you all quite the fright.
But come, you must hurry!

We must flee from here with all haste! I have
much to tell you, but that comes after.
Let’s go, guys!
Are, are you okay, Takuma?
Agumon...
(I honestly don’t know how to respond...)

(What should I have said? What was
I thinking?)

(Shuuji’s odd behavior, his snapping, then
his death.)

(Lopmon’s bizarre evolution...and the
enemy’s goals, which we still don’t know.)

(With all these problems piling on, all we
could do was run...)
What should we do, Takuma? I...I’m so scared!

It’s gonna be okay, Aoi. Me, Labramon, we’re
all here with you.

Yeah, you’re right... I’m sorry. Now’s not
the time to lose heart.

Those with weak hearts will be swallowed
right up!
Hey, are you okay, Takuma?
Yeah... Yeah, I think so. For now, anyway.
Since the oldest one of us is gone and all...

You’ll have to be the next leader. Everyone
seems to look up to you.

I’m surprised at how much I’ve come to rely
on you myself. Just...don’t overdo it, okay?
Are you all right, Saki?

Umm...well... It’s just so awful, you know?
Why did things turn out this way?

Try to keep it together. We’ve gotta stay
calm and focused.
...Yeah, you’re right. Thanks. Um, Takuma...

You...aren’t gonna disappear too, are you?
Please... Please don’t...

The little guys are so nice... Why couldn’t
Shuuji trust them?

Other creatures just kept on attacking. The
fear of that caused him to jump at shadows.

I’ve had some scary things happen here, too.
I don’t think this is a world of joy anymore.

But I think the ones around us are pretty
trustworthy, myself...
Hold on to that feeling, Miu.

Don’t worry! I believe in Syakomon, after
all!
Things have gotten pretty nuts, haven’t they?

Yeah... I never thought things would turn out
this way.

I don’t want to say it, but...
Sorry, I’m pretty freaked out.

The only reason I’m not bouncing off the
walls is you, Takuma.
...Thanks, man. Thanks for being here.
